page.title: 16The Family
page.content: 30% of our children came from a "two-child" family. 30% also came from a "three-child" family. 10% were "only" children. 10% had four children and 10% had five children in their families. Most families had three bedroom houses whatever size the family but about 30% had four-bedroom houses. Between 25% and 30% of families were divorced and mostly remarried which might account for the large families. Almost all the fathers worked within 20 miles of Witney with a couple commuting to London and quite a number travelling to Oxford but most fathers worked within a few miles of home. About 60% of mothers worked, either part time or full time. They mostly worked very close to home. Only a couple of families had a grandparent living with them.
